ModMetaData.name: World Map Beautification Project - for More Vanilla Biomes
ModMetaData.author: Carolusclen
ModMetaData.description:
[h1] More Vanilla Biomes Addon [/h1] This is a DLC for the mod "World Map Beautification Project" by Odeum.
The DLC adds support for the "More Vanilla Biomes" mod
[h1] Features [/h1] [b]Alpine Meadow[/b] - High altitude with rich soil and lots of flowers. [list] [*] From the peaks to the hills, flowers everywhere with snow capped monolithic mountains [/list] [b]Cloud Forest[/b] - Aptly named for the constant fog. [list] [*] Mysterious fog shrouded mountains [/list] [b]Coastal Dunes[/b] - Low lying sandy area with lots of water. [list] [*] Rolling sandy dunes [/list] [b]Desert Oasis[/b] - Desert with a few small islands of life. [list] [*] Is it a mirage? [/list] [b]Grasslands[/b] - Grasslands with few trees. [list] [*] Grass filled mountains [*] Lush green fields [/list] [b]Icebergs[/b] - Chunks of sea ice floating on water. [list] [*] Ice the size of mountains, dont hit one! [/list] [b]Marsh[/b] - Flat and swampy. Dense vegetation, but few trees. [list] [*] Soft and wet mounds [*] Wet and muddy fields [/list] [b]Sandbar[/b] - Small, flat sandbars scattered in water. [list] [*] Shifting dunes [/list] [b]Glacial Shield[/b] - Where the glacier meets the tundra, this area is icy, rocky, and cold almost year-round. [list] [*] Snow capped mountains with thick forests [/list] [b]Badlands[/b] - Rocky, dry and desolate, these temperate regions feature little life. [list] [*] Sprawling desert mountains [/list]
